forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 49F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low 11C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers late. Low 51F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.
